ca.team3161.lib.robot

Class Subsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.robot.Subsystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PIDDrivetrain, Shooter

    public abstract class Subsystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstracts a system which uses resources and has some task (recurring or one-shot) to be performed. An example is PID control - monitor sensors and periodically set motor values based on this.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean cancelled
      If this task has been requested for cancellation
      protected boolean repeating
      If this task repeats, or runs once only
      protected java.util.Vector resources
      A list of resources which this Subsystem requires (see ResourceTracker)
      protected boolean started
      If this task has been started
      protected long TASK_TIMEOUT
      The period length between task repeats (milliseconds)
      protected java.lang.String threadName
      The name to assign to the background task

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Subsystem(long timeout, boolean repeating, java.lang.String threadName) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel the background task of this Subsystem (stop it from running, if it is a recurring task)
      protected abstract void defineResources()
      Use require() to define a set of required resources
      boolean getCancelled() 
      protected void require(java.lang.Object resource) 
      void start()
      Start (or restart) this Subsystem's background task
      protected abstract void task()
      The background task to run

    • Constructor Detail

      • Subsystem

        protected Subsystem(long timeout,
         boolean repeating,
         java.lang.String threadName)
        Parameters:
        timeout - update period (in milliseconds) between task repeats (if any)
        repeating - true iff the task is recurring
        threadName - the name for the background thread of this Subsystem

    • Method Detail

      • require

        protected final void require(java.lang.Object resource)
        Parameters:
        resource - a sensor, speed controller, etc. that this subsystem needs exclusive access to during its task

      • getCancelled

        public boolean getCancelled()
        Returns:
        if this Subsystem's background task has been canceled

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel the background task of this Subsystem (stop it from running, if it is a recurring task)

      • start

        public final void start()
        Start (or restart) this Subsystem's background task

      • defineResources

        protected abstract void defineResources()
        Use require() to define a set of required resources

      • task

        protected abstract void task()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The background task to run
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case the defined task throws any Exceptions
